description: Try our easy to follow Dauphinoise Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato bake,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato
name: Dauphinoise Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 900g waxy potatoes (peeled and cut into slices 3mm thick)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C. Put the potatoes, cream, and milk in a large pan, and season with salt and black pepper. Bring to the boil, then cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the potatoes are beginning to soften.

Using a slotted spoon, transfer the potatoes to a shallow 2.3L ovenproof dish. Sprinkle over the garlic and season well with salt and black pepper. Strain the cream and milk mixture, then pour over the potatoes. Cover the dish with foil, then put in the oven to cook for 1 hour. Remove the foil and cook for a further 30 minutes, or until the top has begun to turn golden.
